original_text: Abimelech said, ‘You have done a bad thing against us! One of my men might have had sex with your wife. Then we would have been guilty of a bad sin.’
korean_text: 아비멜렉이 이르되 네가 어찌 우리에게 이렇게 행하였느냐 백성 중 하나가 네 아내와 동침할 뻔하였도다 네가 죄를 우리에게 입혔으리라

sentences.original_text: You have done a bad thing against us!
One of my men might have had sex with your wife.
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 사람 중 한 명이 네 아내와 성관계를 했을 수도 있었다.

sentences.original_text: Then we would have been guilty
